name: codebook-md
displayName: Codebook MD - Organize Notebooks & Execute Code-Blocks
description: Organize your notebooks and execute notebook code-blocks directly in markdown docs! Supports Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bash, Python, SQL - and more to come!

codebook-md.rootPath.description: The root path of the workspace. This is used to resolve relative paths in code blocks.

codebook-md.tempPath.description: Path where temporary exec-related file(s) will be stored.

codebook-md.permalinkPrefix.description: Prefix for identifying permalinks. When matched in a markdown, the permalink will be converted to a link to the same file/lines in VS Code.

codebook-md.deleteExecFileOnSuccess.description: Delete the temporary exec file after a successful run.

showExecutableCodeInOutput.description: Show the executable code at the top of the output (default: false).

showOutputOnRun.description: Show the output cell on run (default: true).

replaceOutputCell.description: Prepend the executable code to the output (default: true).

showTimestamp.description: Show the timestamp at the top of the output (default: true).

timestampTimezone.description: Timezone to use for the timestamp.

execTypeRunFilename.description: Filename to use for 'run' execution type.

execTypeTestBuildTag.description: Build tag to use for 'test' execution type. This tag is added to the top of the test file to help ensure it doesn't run in normal test runs.

execTypeTestFilename.description: Filename to use for 'test' execution type.

execType.description: Execution type for Go; 'run' will run using a 'main.go' using 'go run'; 'test' will run from a local '_test.go' file using 'go test'.

goimportsCmd.description: 'goimports' requires goimports to be installed. If null, 'gopls imports' will be used.

showOutputOnRun.description: Show the output cell on run (default: true).

replaceOutputCell.description: Prepend the executable code to the output (default: true).

showTimestamp.description: Show the timestamp at the top of the output (default: true).

timestampTimezone.description: Timezone to use for the timestamp.

execSingleLineAsCommand.description: If true, bash code-blocks that are a single line will be executed as a command - instead of a script.

execFilename.description: Filename for the executable HTTP script.

verbose.description: Whether to use verbose mode for HTTP requests (adds -v flag to curl).

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.enabled.description: Enable or disable the Dynamic Folder Group in the My Notebooks webview

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.name.description: Display name for the Dynamic Folder Group

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.descripti.default: Auto-generated based on the current file
codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.descripti.description: Description shown when hovering over the Dynamic Folder Group

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.subFolder.description: List of sub-folder names to include when searching for markdown files (e.g., ['.github', '.vscode'])

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.exclusion.description: List of patterns to exclude from the Dynamic Folder Group

codebook-md.output.showExecutableCodeInO.description: Show the executable code at the top of the output

codebook-md.output.replaceOutputCell.description: Prepend the executable code to the output

codebook-md.output.showTimestamp.description: Show the timestamp at the top of the output

codebook-md.output.timestampTimezone.description: Timezone to use for the timestamp (e.g., 'America/New_York', leave empty for local timezone)

codebook-md.dynamicFolderGroup.description: Configuration for the Dynamic Folder Group in the My Notebooks webview

exclusions.description: List of folder or file patterns to exclude from the Dynamic Folder Group
